amendment.description: Amendment reallocates $14 million from each of the FY 2011 administrative budgets of the CDC, HRSA, and NIH which totals $42 million for use by the AIDS Drug Assistance Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in the Congressional Record to eliminate reductions in funds for NIH, CDC and HRSA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A089) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A089) offered by Mr. Hastings (FL).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A089) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
